code: import{useQuery}from"react-query";import axios from"axios";function fetchProduct(_ref){var slug=_ref.slug;return axios.get("http://localhost:5000/shop/".concat(slug)).then(function(response){return response.data;});}export function useSingleProduct(_ref2){var slug=_ref2.slug;return useQuery("singleProduct",function(){return fetchProduct({slug:slug});});}
